name: thnks fr th mmrs
description:
thnks fr th mmrs, a game by celine lassus

live it up in Hawaii as you play as 12 y/o me traveling with my aunt! just make sure u don't have too much fun ;)

coined by Holly Marie Armishaw, class dysphoria = mental state of unease that one experiences when they are unable to easily categorize themselves into a binary or trinary class identity

hope you have fun playing my first game xx
